headline: Agilent Expands the Dako Omnis Family with Three New Models to Meet Evolving Pathology Lab Needs
summary: SANTA CLARA, Calif., August 04, 2025--Agilent Technologies Inc. (NYSE: A) today announced the introduction of its Dako Omnis family of instruments with three new models—Agilent Dako Omnis 110, 165, and 165 Duo—designed to meet the evolving needs of pathology laboratories of all sizes. These new instruments provide labs with the flexibility to tailor their staining solutions according to volume, workflow, and diagnostic requirements.
